============================================
core/subroutines/call_super_method_rhs
============================================

function void foo();
    a = super.new();
endfunction

----

(source_file
  (function_declaration
    (function_body_declaration
      (data_type_or_void)
      name: (simple_identifier)
      (function_statement_or_null
        (function_statement
          (statement
            (statement_item
              (blocking_assignment
                (operator_assignment
                  (variable_lvalue
                    (hierarchical_identifier
                      (simple_identifier)))
                  (assignment_operator)
                  (expression
                    (primary
                      (function_subroutine_call
                        (subroutine_call
                          (method_call
                            (implicit_class_handle)
                            (method_call_body
                              name: (simple_identifier))))))))))))))))
